Text.text: This application App3 will navigate to App2. There are multiple App2 applications available but from different content providers. The 'App2' application from content provider '{/contentProviderId}' should be opened as the current content provider is preserved across navigations. The alternative 'App2' application that may (wrongly) open is from content provider B.
